metadata.feature_description: Provides comprehensive file management including rename, delete, copy, move operations with permission validation

steps.action: Navigate to Assets panel and hover over test_document.txt file
steps.expected: File action buttons should appear on hover
steps.actual: File action buttons appeared on hover including edit, move, copy, download, delete

steps.action: Click edit button to open file details panel
steps.expected: File details panel should open with Name field
steps.actual: File details panel opened showing file metadata and editable Name field

steps.expected: Name field should accept the new valid name

steps.action: Open file details panel for a file
steps.actual: File details panel opened with Name field

steps.expected: System should reject the invalid characters
steps.actual: Error message displayed: 'The name contains invalid character(s). Please specify a name without \:/*?"<>|.'

steps.action: Open file details panel and clear the Name field completely
steps.actual: Name field was cleared, showing empty input with required (*) indicator

steps.action: Click Save button with empty name
steps.expected: System should show validation error for required field
steps.actual: Red error tooltip appeared showing 'Text is required'

steps.action: Hover over 'renamed_document.txt' and click delete button
steps.actual: Confirmation dialog appeared asking 'Are you sure you want to delete renamed_document.txt?'

steps.action: Click Confirm button in delete dialog
steps.expected: File should be deleted and removed from the list
steps.actual: File was successfully deleted and no longer appears in the assets list

steps.action: Hover over test_image.png and click copy button
steps.expected: Copy dialog should open with folder tree
steps.actual: Copy dialog opened showing 'Copy file to (select a destination)' with folder tree

steps.action: Select Site Root (same folder) and click Copy
steps.expected: File should be copied with automatic '-Copy' suffix
steps.actual: File was copied as 'test_image-Copy.png' in the same folder

steps.action: Hover over test_image2.png and click copy button
steps.actual: Copy dialog opened with folder tree showing available destinations

steps.action: Select Images folder and click Copy
steps.expected: File should be copied to Images folder
steps.actual: File was successfully copied to the Images folder. Notification appeared confirming the file was added.

steps.action: Hover over test_image3.png and click move button
steps.expected: Move dialog should open with folder tree
steps.actual: Move dialog opened showing 'Move file to (select a destination)' with folder tree

steps.action: Select Images folder and click Move
steps.expected: File should be moved to Images folder and removed from current location
steps.actual: File was successfully moved to Images folder. Notification appeared confirming the move.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Handle naming conflicts during copy with overwrite option

steps.action: Copy test_image2.png to Images folder where it already exists
steps.expected: System should detect conflict and prompt for overwrite
steps.actual: Conflict dialog appeared: 'Item test_image2.png already exists in destination folder. Do you want to replace?'

steps.action: Click Replace button to confirm overwrite
steps.expected: File should be overwritten in destination
steps.actual: File was successfully replaced in the Images folder

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Move file to same folder (error handling)

steps.action: Open move dialog for test_image.png and select Site Root (same folder)
steps.expected: System should prevent moving to same folder
steps.actual: Error message appeared: 'Destination folder cannot match the source folder.'

observations: Multi-select functionality for bulk delete operations was not found in the UI. Files must be deleted individually.
Code review shows permission checks are implemented for COPY and READ operations via FolderPermissionController
The copy operation automatically appends '-Copy' suffix when copying to the same folder, and increments with '-Copy(n)' if multiple copies exist
Invalid filename characters are validated client-side with the pattern: \:/*?"<>|
File details panel shows comprehensive metadata including created date, type, size, last modified date, and direct URL
The Versioning tab in file details panel provides version history functionality
